job_description:
Job Title: Sr. Java Developer
Locations: Mississauga, ON
Type of hire: Fulltime
Job Description:
Hands-on development experience
6+yrs experience in Java, threading, concurrency, and collections Lead developer Managing the team
At least 3+ years of experience in a server-side language (Java 8) and Spring Framework
Experience utilizing Angular, Bootstrap or other responsive frameworks as part of development efforts
Strong experience with Rest APIs and Web Services
Well-versed in user-centered design methods and techniques - including development methodologies and best practices
Intermediate to strong knowledge of user interface design processes and methodology, particularly as applied to web-based Applications
